text:
@NikkiHaley @realDonaldTrump @VP Where was Trump for those 6 weeks when he sat on his hands and said it was a "hoax" and that it was "under control?" 6 weeks to get geared up before COVID-19 got here?
No you suck up Shill, I'm not grateful for Trump's failure of leadership.
So K.M.A. and STFU.
Okay?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
